SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
Main application class that sets up and runs an election simulation.
Candidate
Represents a candidate with information about their votes and electoral district.
CandidateComparators
Provides a collection of Comparators for Comparing Candidate objects.
CandidateMapper
Provides a functional mapping interface for Candidate objects.
CandidateValidator
Implementation of the Validator interface for Candidate objects.
DataGenerator
Interface providing methods to generate data for the election simulation, such as voters and candidates.
Elections
Represents a single instance of an election.
ElectoralDistrict
Enumeration representing the various electoral districts in the system.
Validator<T>
A generic interface for validating objects of type T.
Voter
Class representing the voter in an election.
